text: is a Japanese ski jumper. He competed at the 1968 Winter Olympics, the 1972 Winter Olympics and the 1972 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male ski jumpers Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Japan Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Hiroshi Itagaki
